remarks: Change the domain of an integrability predicate.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
statement:
iblss2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ B ) $.
iblss2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. dom vol ) $.
iblss2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. V ) $.
iblss2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. ( B \ A ) ) -> C = 0 ) $.
iblss2.5 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblss2 $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d V x $.
$d ph x $.
